column4: I am unable to play Gnome NetHack. This is unacceptable as I am highly addicted and have not yet ascended. When I run the file, nothing happens at all. Any ideas why this might be?
nethack-gnome at the command line should give you some error messages
add yourself to the games group
how?
there is no games group. I created it and added myself to it, to no avail. same strange errors
sec i'm installing it
dhn_: I just noticed this at the end of the error counts: Perhaps there is an old /var/games/nethack/perm_lock around? Edgy dhn
check   ps aux | grep nethack   also   ls -l /var/games/nethack/perm_lock
maybe it crashed first time you tried to run it or something.
how does one unlock it?
sudo rm /var/games/nethack/perm_lock
ah, ok, so it runs, then as soon as I choose my orcish barbarian female, the game crashes
I would agree
might try nethack-x11
I tried x11, qt, all the others
I WINEed the win version... it was Very slow. is that typical?
meaning you use sth else?
i nethack on a telnet server.   telnet nethack.alt.org  :]
in the telnethack, must my name always be my username? or can I specify it?
your name will always be your username, but you can create a new username whenever you want to
and apply it to the same email address?
join #nethack for questions about alt.org
lol ty
